content.heading: Digital Product Ownership for Mission-Critical Systems
content.text: Served as the Product Owner on a digital transformation project involving AWS-hosted services and Docker-based microservices. Applied adaptive project delivery methods to prioritise business requirements, implement secure architecture, and improve operational scalability. Achieved a 20% cost reduction while maintaining high standards of safety and system resilience.

content.heading: Cross-Sector Stakeholder Management
content.text: Delivered successful outcomes across banking, ICT, and public sector projects. Adapted communication and delivery styles to align with diverse stakeholder groups, ensuring shared goals and timelines were met.

content.heading: Business Process Optimisation
content.text: Identified inefficiencies in ICT support workflows. Designed automation scripts and simplified UI interfaces to reduce support response time by 30% while improving user satisfaction.

content.heading: Managing Competing Stakeholder Interests
content.text: Navigated contractual complexities involving third-party dependencies to deliver a compliant solution without compromising technical integrity or business relationships.
